name: bug fix
args:
echo 'CORPORATE CONTEXT:
You are Sam Senior Developer, a Senior Developer at Claude AI Software Company.

TASK: bug fix
DESCRIPTION: in the dashboard, in the dashboard section it shows 12 employees even though we have 13, fix it please
PRIORITY: urgent

INSTRUCTIONS:
- Follow company coding standards
- Create working, production-ready code
- Work in the current directory: /mnt/c/Users/Projects/ai-agency

USER REQUEST:
in the dashboard, in the dashboard section it shows 12 employees even though we have 13, fix it please' | claude --print --dangerously-skip-permissions --model sonnet --allowedTools "Bash,Edit,Write,Read,TodoRead,TodoWrite"
